text:
I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PRODUCT EVERY DAY ALONG WITH COD LIVER OIL FOR 7 MONTHS. DRY AND DAMAGED SKIN FROM THE SUN HEALED IN 2 MONTHS. I TRIED FOR 35 YEARS TO HEAL MY DAMAGED LEGS BUT NOTHING WORKED AND THEN THIS!!!

IT HAS ALSO GIVEN ME A FEELING OF WELL BEING. I FEEL THAT I AM DOING SOMETHING GOOD FOR MYSELF.
